SourceText: Step 1: THINK
text: Hatua ya Kwanza: FIKIRI

SourceText: Think about what we spend money on each month.
text: Fikiria mambo tunayotumia pesa kila mwezi.

SourceText:
* Get a piece of paper (or old newspaper or a cardboard box) and a pen. 
* Draw pictures of all the things that you and your family spend money on each month. 
* Write next to each picture how much each thing costs each month. (There is no need to share the numbers if you don’t want to.)
* Add up how much money you have to spend each month.
text:
* Chukua kipande cha karatasi (au gazeti la zamani au kasha la karatasi nene) na kalamu.
* Chora picha za vitu vyote vinavyokufanya wewe na familia yako mtumie pesa kila mwezi.
* Andika pembeni mwa kila picha kiasi ambacho kitu hicho kinagharimu kila mwezi. (Hakuna haja ya kuwashirikisha wengine viwango hivyo kama hautaki kufanya hivyo.)
* Jumlisha kiasi cha pesa unazotakiwa kutumia kila mwezi.

SourceText:
Wonderful! You finished step 1! 

Let’s move on!
text:
Inastaajabisha! Umemaliza hatua ya kwanza!

Tuendelee!

SourceText:
Talk together about your needs and wants

WANT: Something you can live without
NEED: Something you cannot live without
text:
Zungumzeni pamoja kuhusu mahitaji yenu na matamanio yenu

MATAMANIO: Vitu ambavyo mnaweza kuishi bila kuwa navyo
MAHITAJI: Vitu ambavyo hamuwezi kuishi bila kuwa navyo

SourceText:
People often don’t see things in the same way. When we talk about our needs and wants, we understand each other better and can make good choices together on how to spend our money.

Look at your lists of things you spend money on and discuss:
* Which are NEEDS that you cannot live without? Why?
* Which are WANTS which are nice to have but not essential? Why? 
* Which things could you try to spend less money on as a family?
text:
Mara nyingi watu huona mambo kwa namna inayotofautiana. Tunapozungumzia mahitaji na matamanio yetu, tunaelewana vizuri zaidi na tunaweza kufanya uchaguzi mzuri zaidi pamoja kuhusu jinsi ya kutumia pesa zetu.

Angalieni orodha yenu ya vitu mnavyotumia pesa na mchague:
* Je, vitu gani ni MAHITAJI ambayo hamuwezi kuishi bila kuwa nayo? Kwanini?
* Je, vitu gani ni MATAMANIO kwani vinapendeza kuwa navyo lakini si vya lazima? Kwanini?
* Je, kama familia, ni vitu gani vinaweza kuwafanya mjaribu kutumia pesa kidogo?

SourceText: Step 2: CHOOSE
text: Hatua ya Pili: CHAGUA

SourceText:
Think about your needs and wants

WANT: Something you can live without
NEED: Something you cannot live without
text:
Fikirieni kuhusu mahitaji na matamanio yenu

MATAMANIO: Vitu ambavyo mnaweza kuishi bila kuwa navyo
MAHITAJI: Vitu ambavyo hamuwezi kuishi bila kuwa navyo

SourceText:
Look at your list of things you spend money on and choose:
* Which are NEEDS that you cannot live without? Why?
* Which are WANTS which are nice to have but not essential? Why? 
* Which things could you try to spend less money on?
text:
Angalieni orodha yenu ya vitu mnavyotumia, pesa na mchague:
* Je, vitu gani ni MAHITAJI ambayo hamuwezi kuishi bila kuwa nayo? Kwanini?
* Je, vitu gani ni MATAMANIO kwani vinapendeza kuwa navyo lakini si vya lazima? Kwanini?
* Je, kama familia, ni vitu gani vinaweza kuwafanya mjaribu kutumia pesa kidogo?

SourceText: Make a budget!
text: Tengeneza bajeti!

SourceText:
* Write down what your income is for the month.
* Take some stones or beans or anything with lots of bits - this is your income for the month. 
(For example: If your income is @global.currency@local.monthly_income, and you have @local.number_of_beans beans, each bean is @global.currency@local.bean_value.)
* Decide what you will spend on what, and put the stones/objects on that image. 

Not sure about your decisions? Having trouble deciding between "needs" and "wants"? That is totally fine!
text:
* Andikeni kipato chenu kwa mwezi.
* Chukueni hindi au maharage kadhaa au kitu chochote cha chembechembe – hicho ndicho kipato chenu kwa mwezi.
(Kwa mfano: Kama kipato chenu ni @global.currency@local.monthly_income, na mna maharage @local.number_of_beans, kila harage ni @global.currency@local.bean_value.)
* Amueni mtatumia kiasi gani kwenye kitu gani, na muweke hindi /vitu kwenye picha hiyo.

Hamna hakika kuhusu maamuzi yenu? Mnasumbuka kuamua "mahitaji" ni yapi na "matamanio" ni yapi? Hakuna shida kabisa!

SourceText: Make a budget as one big family!
text: Tengeneza bajeti kama familia moja kubwa!

SourceText:
* One person will volunteer to share his/her list (If no one volunteers you can make a new list together) 
* Take roles - some will be adults, some will be teens. 
* Decide what your income is for the month.
* Take some stones or beans or anything with lots of bits - this is your income for the month. 
(For example: If your income is @global.currency@local.monthly_income, and you have @local.number_of_beans beans, each bean is @global.currency@local.bean_value.)  
* Decide together what you will spend on what, and put the stones/objects on that image. 

Not sure about your decisions? Having trouble deciding between "needs" and "wants"? That’s totally fine!
text:
* Mtu mmoja ajitolee kuwashirikisha wengine orodha yake (Kama hakuna mtu anayejitolea, mnaweza kutengeneza orodha mpya pamoja)
* Gawaneni majukumu – wengine watakuwa watu wazima, wengine watakuwa vijana.
* Amueni kipato chenu kwa mwezi ni kiasi gani.
* Chukueni hindi au maharage kadhaa au kitu chochote chenye chembechembe nyingi – hicho ndicho kipato chenu kwa mwezi.
(Kwa mfano: Kama kipato chenu ni @global.currency@local.monthly_income, na mna maharage @local.number_of_beans, kila harage ni @global.currency@local.bean_value.)
* Amueni pamoja mtatumia kiasi gani kwenye kitu gani, na muweke mawe/vitu kwenye picha hiyo.

Hamna hakika kuhusu maamuzi yenu? Mnasumbuka kuamua "mahitaji" ni yapi na "matamanio" ni yapi? Hakuna shida kabisa!

SourceText: Step 3: BUILD
text: Hatua ya Tatu: TENGENEZA

SourceText: Step 4: PLAN
text: Hatua ya Nne: PANGA

SourceText: Plan how you can save money, so you can deal with emergencies and realise your family goals!
text: Pangeni jinsi mnavyoweza kuweka akiba ya pesa, ili muweze kukabiliana na dharura na kutimiza malengo ya familia yenu!

SourceText:
If you can save even a tiny amount for the future or emergency - it can make a big difference over time. 
* Add a circle called “emergencies”.
* Add a circle called “family goals”.
* Now try to move your money around so you can save a bit every month for each of these.
text:
Kama mnaweza kuweka akiba hata kiasi kidogo kwa ajili ya siku zijazo au dharura – kinaweza kusaidia sana.
* Wekeni mduara uitwao "dharura".
* Wekeni mduara uitwao "malengo ya familia".
* Sasa jaribuni kugawanya pesa zenu ili muweze kuweka akiba kidogo kila mwezi kwa mambo yote haya.

SourceText: CONGRATULATIONS!!! You’ve made your family budget – and using it will make a huge difference for you. I think every person in your group deserves a praise, don’t you?
text: HONGERA!!! Mmetengeneza bajeti ya familia yenu – na kuitumia kutakuletea mabadiliko makubwa. Ninadhani kila mtu kwenye kikundi chenu anastahili kusifiwa, au sivyo?

SourceText: CONGRATULATIONS!!! You’ve made your family budget – and using it will make a huge difference for you. I think every person in your family deserves a praise, don’t you?
text: HONGERA!!! Mmetengeneza bajeti ya familia yako – na kuitumia kutakuletea mabadiliko makubwa. Ninadhani kila mtu katika familia yako anastahili kusifiwa, au sivyo?

SourceText: CONGRATULATIONS!!! You have made your budget – remember to do this exercise again with your other family members - if you agree on a plan together it will make a huge difference!
text: HONGERA!!! Umetengeneza bajeti yako – kumbuka kufanya zoezi hili tena na wanafamilia wengine – kama mtakubaliana kuhusu mpango fulani pamoja, mpango huo utaleta mabadiliko makubwa!

SourceText: Have you talked with your teen about your family budget yet?
text: Je, umeshazungumza na kijana wako kuhusu bajeti ya familia yenu?

SourceText:
Whenever you feel alone or overwhelmed, know that you are not alone. There are parents all over the world who are going through the same struggles as you. 

You are doing your best every day and we’re all proud of you!
text:
Wakati wowote unapohisi upweke au kuzidiwa, jua kwamba hauko peke yako. Kuna wazazi duniani kote ambao wanapitia hali kama yako.

Kila siku unafanya kadri ya uwezo wako na sisi sote tunajivua wewe!

SourceText:
Involving your family in how you spend your money can take away a lot of stress and arguments. 

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title to help your family with budgeting and saving. It's actually easy - you will see!
text:
Kuishirikisha familia yako kuhusu namna mnavyotumia fedha kunaweza kuondoa misongo mingi ya mawazo na ugomvi.

Maliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title ili kuisaidia familia yako kutengeneza bajeti na kuweka akiba. Kwa kweli ni rahisi – utajionea mwenyewe!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText:
Hi @fields.user_name! You are starting your second month of using @global.parent_app. Amazing! 

Almost every family struggles with money issues, therefore, this week’s @global.workshop will give you a tool that will help you to plan your expenses so you can have enough money to get through the month.
text:
Habari @fields.user_name! Unaanza mwezi wako wa pili wa kutumia @global.parent_app. Inastaajabisha!

Karibu kila familia inahangaishwa na masuala ya pesa, kwa hiyo, @global.workshop ya wiki hii itakupa nyenzo itakayokusaidia kupanga matumizi yako ili uweze kuwa na pesa za kutosha kumaliza mwezi.

SourceText:
Hi @fields.group_name! You are starting your second month of using @global.parent_app. Amazing! 

Almost every family struggles with money issues, therefore, this week’s @global.workshop will give you a tool that will help you to plan your expenses so you can have enough money to get through the month.
text:
Habari @fields.group_name! Unaanza mwezi wako wa pili wa kutumia @global.parent_app. Inastaajabisha!

Karibu kila familia inahangaishwa na masuala ya pesa, kwa hiyo, @global.workshop ya wiki hii itakupa nyenzo itakayokusaidia kupanga matumizi yako ili uweze kuwa na pesa za kutosha kumaliza mwezi.

SourceText:
Do you feel stressed about money? Does your teen keep asking for things you can’t afford? 

This week’s @global.workshop deals with money and budgeting.
text:
Je, unahisi msongo wa mawazo kuhusu fedha? Je, kijana wako anaendelea kuomba vitu ambavyo huwezi kuvimudu?

@global.workshop ya wiki hii inahusu fedha na bajeti.
note: The string @global.workshop should not be translated.

SourceText:
It seems you haven’t finished the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title yet. Many parents said that making a budget brought peace back into their house – it can work for you too.

Thank you again for being such a committed parent.
text:
Inaonekana bado haujamaliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Wazazi wengi wanasema kuwa kutengeneza bajeti kumerudisha amani ndani ya nyumba zao – inaweza kukufaa pia.

Kwa mara nyingine, asante kwa kuwa mzazi makini.
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Great that you completed @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, a new @global.workshop is unlocked to help you set family rules that work.
text: Ni vizuri umemaliza@local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kesho, @global.workshop mpya itafunguliwa ili kukusaidia kuweka sheria za familia zinazofanya kazi.

SourceText: Take a moment and just be impressed at what you’ve achieved, despite all the other things you have to do each day.
text: Tenga muda kidogo ili ufurahie mafanikio uliyoyapata, licha ya mambo mengine yote unayopaswa kuyafanya kila siku.

SourceText:
* Story – that didn’t work… 
* Budgeting exercise
* Story & discussion – that worked!
* Story & discussion – that didn’t work…
* Discussion on saving options
* Saving exercise
* Tools: How to budget & save
THINK - CHOOSE - BUILD - PLAN
* Home practice suggestions
text:
* Hadithi – haikufanikiwa…
* Zoezi la kutengeneza bajeti
* Hadithi & majadiliano – ilifanikiwa!
* Hadithi & majadiliano – hayakufanikiwa…
* Majadiliano kuhusu njia za kuweka akiba
* Zoezi la kuweka akiba
*Nyenzo: Jinsi ya kutengeneza bajeti & kuweka akiba
FIKIRI – CHAGUA – TENGENEZA – PANGA
* Mazoezi ya nyumbani yanayopendekezwa

SourceText: What are your  family savings goals?
text: Je, malengo ya familia yako ya kuweka akiba ni yapi?

SourceText:
Such great goals! 

Such a great goal! When we make a good budget and saving plan together, we can achieve it and feel proud of ourselves!
text:
Hayo ni malengo mazuri sana!

Hilo ni lengo zuri sana! Tunapopanga pamoja bajeti nzuri na mpango mzuri wa kuweka akiba, tunaweza kufanikiwa na kuona fahari!

SourceText: We all have dreams for our family, just like @global.w_money_grandma. By setting aside a bit of money every month, you can realise them too!
text: Sisi sote tuna ndoto kwa ajili ya familia zetu, kama alivyo @global.w_money_grandma. Kwa kutenga pesa kidogokidogo kila mwezi, unaweza pia kuzitimiza malengo hayo!
note: The string @global.w_money_grandma should not be translated.

SourceText: What are your family savings goals?
text: Je, malengo ya familia yako ya kuweka akiba ni yapi?

SourceText:
Such a great goal! 

By making a good budget and saving plan, you can achieve it and feel proud of yourself!
text:
Hilo ni lengo zuri sana!

Kwa kutengeneza bajeti nzuri na mpango mzuri wa kuweka akiba, unaweza kufanikiwa na kuona fahari!

SourceText: Let's talk about this story.
text: Hebu tuzungumzie hadithi hii.

SourceText:
For @global.w_money_grandma, a storm happened. 

What other emergencies could come up for us?
text:
Kwa @global.w_money_grandma, dhoruba ilitokea.

Je, kuna dharura gani nyingine zinazoweza kutokea?
note: The string @global.w_money_grandma should not be translated.

SourceText: Let's think about this story.
text: Hebu tufikirie kuhusu hadithi hii.

SourceText: For @global.w_money_grandma, a storm happened.
text: Kwa @global.w_money_grandma, dhoruba ilitokea.
note: The string @global.w_money_grandma should not be translated.

SourceText: What other emergencies could come up for your family?
text: Je, kuna dharura gani nyingine zinazoweza kutokea kwenye familia yako?

SourceText: Emergencies can happen in any family. Saving some money for these emergencies BEFORE they happen prevents a lot of sudden worry and stress!
text: Dharura zinaweza kutokea kwenye familia yoyote. Kuweka akiba ya pesa kwa ajili ya dharura hizi KABLA hazijatokea huzuia wasiwasi mwingi na msongo wa mawazo wa ghafla!

SourceText: Let's talk about different ways we can save.
text: Hebu tuzungumzie njia mbalimbali za kujiwekea akiba.

SourceText:
Discuss together: 
* In which different ways can we save?  
* What are the advantages and disadvantages of each savings option? 

Understanding each option well will help you to decide what is the best saving option for your family.  

Whatever savings plan you choose, it will really help your family move forward!
text:
Jadilini pamoja:
* Je, kuna njia zipi tunazoweza kuzitumia kujiwekea akiba?
* Je, kuna faida na hasara zipi kwa kila njia ya kujiwekea akiba?

Kuelewa vizuri kila njia kutawasaidia kuamua njia iliyo bora zaidi ya kuweka akiba kwa familia yenu.

Njia yoyote ya kujiwekea akiba mtakayoichagua itaisaidia sana familia yenu kusonga mbele!

SourceText: Let's think about different ways we can save.
text: Hebu tuzungumzie njia mbalimbali za kujiwekea akiba.

SourceText:
There are different ways we can save: at home, buying things we can sell later, at a bank, or in a savings group.

Think of the advantages and disadvantages of each savings option.
text:
Kuna njia mbalimbali tunazoweza kuzitumia kujiwekea akiba: nyumbani, kununua vitu tunavyoweza kuviuza baadaye, benki, au kwenye kikundi cha kuweka akiba.

Fikiria faida na hasara za kila njia ya kujiwekea akiba.

SourceText: What is the best savings option for your family?
text: Je, njia ipi ya kujiwekea akiba ni bora zaidi kwa familia yenu?

SourceText: Whatever savings plan you choose, it will really help your family move forward!
text: Njia yoyote ya kujiwekea akiba mtakayoichagua itaisaidia sana familia yenu kusonga mbele!

SourceText: This week's home practice is to praise your teen once a day. It will only take 10 seconds!
text: Zoezi la nyumbani la wiki hii ni kumsifia kijana wako mara moja kwa siku. Utatumia sekunde 10 tu!

SourceText: Praise time!
text: Muda wa kusifia!

SourceText:
When you see your teen next, praise them for one thing they are doing well! 

And when was the last time you praised yourself or another adult in your household? Try it!
text:
Utakapomwona tena kijana wako, msifie kwa jambo moja analofanya vizuri!

Na, je, ni lini mara ya mwisho ulipojisifia wewe mwenyewe au mtu mzima mwingine katika kaya yako? Jaribu kufanya hivyo!

SourceText: Well done for using @global.parent_app! Remember that it’s the small things that make a big difference.
text:
Hongera kwa kutumia @global.parent_app!
Kumbuka kwamba mambo madogomadogo ndiyo huleta mabadiliko makubwa.
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText:
Praising makes all the difference. 

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title and see how YOU can use praise in your family.
text:
Kusifia huleta mabadiliko makubwa.

Maliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title uone jinsi WEWE unavyoweza kutumia sifa kwenye familia yako.
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

Try the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title and build a great parenting skill!

Hongera kwa kutumia @global.parent_app ili kuwekeza kwa ajili yako na familia yako.

Jaribu @local.workshop_data.in_text_title ujipatie ujuzi mzuri sana wa malezi!

SourceText:
Hi @global.user_name, a new @global.workshop awaits you tomorrow. It seems like you haven’t finished the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title yet. It’s really a short one (promise!) – you can even complete it while waiting for dinner to cook. Why don’t you go through it when you have a few minutes?

Thank you again for using @global.parent_app.
text:
Habari @global.user_name, @global.workshop mpya inakungoja kesho. Inaonekana bado haujamaliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kwa kweli ni fupi sana (nakuahidi) – unaweza hata ukaimaliza wakati unasubiri chakula cha usiku kiive. Kwa nini usiipitie ukipata muda?

Kwa mara nyingine, asante kwa kutumia @global.parent_app.

SourceText: Great that you completed the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, a new @global.workshop is unlocked. Try it - you will see the difference in your teen’s behaviour.
text: Umefanya vizuri sana kumaliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kesho, @global.workshop kipya kitafunguliwa. Jaribu – utaona mabadiliko kwenye tabia ya kijana wako.

SourceText: Think about the last time someone thanked you, or said you did something great.
text: Kumbuka mara ya mwisho mtu alipokushukuru, au kusema umefanya jambo zuri sana.

SourceText: How did it make you feel?
text: Ulijisikiaje?

SourceText: Parents usually do not get thanked or praised enough.
text: Mara nyingi wazazi hawashukuriwi au kusifiwa vya kutosha.

SourceText: How does it make you feel when nobody says "thank you"?
text: Je, unajisikiaje usipoambiwa "asante" na mtu yeyote?

SourceText: Tired
text: Uchovu

SourceText: Your teen can feel this way too. That's what makes this week's parenting tool simple but important: Praise them for what they do right.
text: Kijana wako anaweza pia kujisikia hivyo. Hicho ndicho kinachofanya nyenzo ya malezi ya wiki hii iwe rahisi lakini muhimu: Msifie anapofanya vizuri.

SourceText: How did praise make @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name's teens feel?
text: Je, kusifia kuliwafanya vijana wa @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name wajisikieje?
note: The string @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Why did she praise them?
text: Kwa nini aliwasifia?

SourceText: To get them to do it more often
text: Ili kuwafanya wazidi kufanya hivyo mara nyingi

SourceText: To help her finish her work
text: Kumsaidia amalize kazi yake

SourceText: To make them feel good
text: Ili kuwafanya wajisikie vizuri

SourceText: To make herself feel good
text: Ili yeye mwenyewe ajisikie vizuri

SourceText:
All of those things are true! 

When her teens are happy, @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name feels happy. And she got her work done.
text:
Mambo yote hayo ni ya kweli!

Pindi vijana wake wanapofurahi, @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name hujisikia furaha. Na aliweza kufanya kazi zake.
note: The string @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Step 1: Share what went well and what was hard
text: Hatua ya Kwanza: Shirikisha wengine mambo yaliyoenda vizuri na yaliyokuwa magumu

SourceText: "I learned so much more about my teen’s life when we spent one-on-one time! But after the first day, my teen only wanted to play on his phone."
text: "Nilijifunza mambo mengi zaidi kuhusu maisha ya kijana wangu tulipotumia muda wa pamoja wawili tu! Lakini baada ya siku ya kwanza, kijana wangu alitaka kucheza tu kwenye simu yake."

SourceText: Step 2: Bring ideas!
text: Hatua ya Pili: Changia mawazo!

SourceText:
"Well done for trying! Maybe you could suggest some other fun things you could do together with your teen."

"Yes, or you could do something together on his phone? Or he could show you how his phone works?"
text:
"Hongera kwa kujaribu! Pengine unaweza kupendekeza mambo mengine ya kufurahisha unayoweza kufanya pamoja na kijana wako."

"Ndiyo, au mnaweza kufanya pamoja kitu fulani kwenye simu yake? Au anaweza kukuonyesha jinsi simu yake inavyofanya kazi?"

SourceText: Step 3: Pick and try one!
text: Hatua ya Tatu: Chagua moja na ujaribu!

SourceText: “Thank you for those great ideas! Yes, let me ask my teen to show how his phone works tomorrow after school. Can one of you pretend to be my teen now, so I can practice asking?”
text: “Asante kwa mawazo hayo mazuri sana! Ndiyo, nitamwomba kijana wangu anioneshe jinsi simu yake inavyofanya kazi kesho akitoka shule. Je, mmoja wenu anaweza kuigiza kama kijana wangu, ili nifanye mazoezi ya kuuliza?"

SourceText:
Think about how your home activities went this week. 

Take turns to discuss:

* What went well and what was a problem?
* What solutions can you think of together?
* Pick one solution and try it later with your teen! 

(Or you can even practice it now  so it will be easier later!)
text:
Kumbuka jinsi shughuli zenu za nyumbani zilivyoenda wiki hii.

Jadilini kwa zamu:
* Je, nini kilienda vizuri na nini hakikwenda vizuri?
* Je, kuna njia zipi za utatuzi mnazoweza kuzifikiria pamoja?
* Chagueni njia moja ya utatuzi na mjaribu kuitumia baadaye kwa vijana wenu!

(Au mnaweza hata kuifanyia mazoezi sasa ili iwe rahisi zaidi baadaye!)

SourceText:

SourceText:
Share with each other:

* When last did someone thank you or say you did something great? 
* How did it make you feel? 
* How does it feel if you are not thanked or praised for what you do? 

We usually don’t get thanked or praised enough as parents. Maybe you can give your teens the right example and praise them first when they do something well!
text:
Shirikishaneni nyote:

* Ni lini mara ya mwisho mtu alikushukuru au kusema umefanya jambo zuri sana? 
* Ulijisikiaje? 
* Je, unajisikiaje usiposhukuriwa au kusifiwa kwa kile unachokifanya? 

Mara nyingi kama wazazi hatushukuriwi au kusifiwa vya kutosha. Pengine unaweza kuwapa vijana wako mfano sahihi kwa kuwasifia kwanza wanapofanya kitu vizuri!

SourceText: Let's discuss this story.
text: Hebu tujadili hadithi hii.

SourceText:
Discuss together:

* How did praise make @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name's teens feel?
* Why did she praise them?
text:
Jadili pamoja:

* Je, kusifia kuliwafanya vijana wa @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name wajisikieje?
* Kwa nini aliwasifia?

SourceText: The same can work for you!
text: Wewe pia unaweza kufanya hivyo!

SourceText: @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name praised her teens...
text: @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name aliwasifia vijana wake...
note: The string @global.w_praise_female_caregiver_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
* To get them to do it more often
* To help her finish her work 
* To make them feel good 
* To make herself feel good
text:

* Ili kumsaidia amalize kazi zake 
* Ili kuwafanya wajisikie vizuri 
* Ili yeye mwenyewe ajisikie vizuri

SourceText: Let's practice giving praise.
text: Hebu tufanye mazoezi ya kusifia.

SourceText:
Share with each other: 

* What can you praise your teen for? 
* What has someone else done well during this workshop? Tell them!
* How did it make you feel to praise someone?
* How did it make you feel to be praised?
text:
Shirikishaneni nyote:

* Je, unaweza kumsifia kijana wako kwa kitu gani?
* Je, ni kitu gani ambacho mtu mwingine amefanya vizuri kwenye kipindi hiki? Mwambie!
* Je, ulijisikiaje kumsifia mtu?
* Je, ulijisikiaje kusifiwa?

SourceText: Sometimes it is hard to think of what to praise your teen for! Here are some ideas from other parents:
text: Wakati mwingine ni vigumu kufikiria kitu gani cha kumsifia kijana wako! Haya ni mawazo kutoka kwa wazazi wengine:

SourceText:
* Being kind to someone 
* Cleaning their room 
* Joining a family meal 
* Greeting other family members 
* Looking after siblings 
* Coming home in time 
* Showing thoughtfulness 
* Saying 'please' or 'thank you' 
* Going to school  
* Doing chores or schoolwork  
* Getting through mealtime peacefully
text:
* Kumtendea mtu wema
* Kusafisha chumba chake
* Kula pamoja na familia
* Kuwasalimu wanafamilia wengine
* Kuwatunza ndugu zake
* Kuwahi kurudi nyumbani
* Kuwafikiria wengine
* Kusema 'tafadhali' au 'asante'
* Kwenda shule
* Kufanya kazi za nyumbani au kazi ya shule
* Kumaliza wakati wa kula kwa amani

SourceText:
This week, set one rule together with your teen.

Remember to praise your teen afterwards!
text:
Wiki hii, tengeneza sheria moja pamoja na kijana wako.

Kumbuka kumsifia kijana wako baadaye!

SourceText:
Write down one important rule you would like to make with your teenager – you will be doing this as your home practice this week. 

What will they think about it?
text:
Andika sheria moja muhimu ambayo ungependa kuiweka na kijana wako – hili ndilo litakuwa zoezi lako la nyumbani wiki hii.

Je, atafikiria nini kuhusu sheria hii?

SourceText: Have you managed to set a rule together with your teen?
text: Je, umeweza kutengeneza sheria pamoja na kijana wako?

SourceText: Sometimes it feels like your teens are still grumpy even when you’ve done the best you can. Remember that you are doing an amazing job, and that there will be good times with them too!
text: Wakati mwingine vijana wenu huonekana kama bado wamehamaki hata mnapokuwa mmefanya kadri muwezavyo. Kumbukeni kwamba mnafanya kazi nzuri sana, na mtapata pia nyakati nzuri za kufurahi nao pamoja!

SourceText: You are close to gaining another parenting tool! Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title, set ONE simple and realistic rule with your teen, and see things change!
text: Unakaribia kupata nyenzo nyingine ya malezi! Maliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title, weka sheria MOJA nyepesi na inayotekelezeka pamoja na kijana wako, halafu utaona mambo yatakavyobadilika!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi @fields.user_name! New week, new workshop! Learn how to set household rules in a way that will increase the chances of your teen keeping them.
text: Habari @fields.user_name! Ni wiki mpya na warsha mpya! Jifunze jinsi ya kutengeneza sheria za kaya kwa namna itakayomwongezea kijana wako uwezekano wa kuzifuata.
note: The string @fields.user_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi @fields.group_name! New week, new workshop! Learn how to set household rules in a way that will increase the chances of your teen keeping them.
text: Habari @fields.group_name! Ni wiki mpya na warsha mpya! Jifunze jinsi ya kutengeneza sheria za kaya kwa namna itakayomwongezea kijana wako uwezekano wa kuzifuata.
note: The string @fields.group_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Thank you again for using @global.parent_app and for committing to your parenting journey. 

The @local.workshop_data.in_text_title will show you how to set rules in a way that will help your teen to understand and follow them better.
text:
Kwa mara nyingine, asante kwa kutumia @global.parent_app na kujitolea kwa dhati kwenye safari yako ya malezi.

@local.workshop_data.in_text_title itakuonesha jinsi ya kuweka sheria kwa namna itakayomsaidia kijana wako kuzielewa na kuzifuata vizuri zaidi.

SourceText:
Tomorrow a brand new @global.parent_app workshop is ready for you. 

Try to complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title before starting the new workshop. It won’t take long and will help your teen to follow rules better!
text:
Kesho warsha mpya kabisa ya @global.parent_app itakuwa tayari kwa ajili yako.

Jaribu kumalizia @local.workshop_data.in_text_title kabla ya kuanza warsha mpya. Haitachukua muda mrefu na itamsaidia kijana wako kufuata sheria vizuri zaidi!

SourceText:
Congratulations, you completed the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title.

Tomorrow, a new workshop will help you know what to do when teens show bad (or good) behaviour!
text:
Hongera, umemaliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title.

Kesho, warsha mpya itakusaidia kujua nini cha kufanya pindi vijana wanapoonesha tabia mbaya (au nzuri)!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: They discussed the reasons behind the rule
text: Walijadili sababu za kuwekwa kwa sheria hiyo

SourceText: @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 listened to @global.w_rules_teen_boy’s suggestions
text: @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 alisikiliza maoni ya @global.w_rules_teen_boy

SourceText: The rule was clear, specific and fair
text: Sheria hiyo ilikuwa wazi, maalum na ya haki

SourceText: @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 praised @global.w_rules_teen_boy for helping to make the rule
text: @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 alimsifia @global.w_rules_teen_boy kwa kusaidia kuweka sheria

SourceText: That is right, making clear rules together in a calm and positive way works so well!
text: Hiyo ni kweli, kuweka sheria zilizo wazi kwa kushirikiana na kwa njia ya utulivu na chanya huleta mafanikio makubwa!

SourceText: She praised him
text: Alimsifia

SourceText: She rewarded him when he followed the rule
text: Alimzawadia alipofuata sheria

SourceText: Exactly - a positive response makes all the difference!
text: Sawasawa – mwitikio chanya huleta mabadiliko makubwa!

SourceText: This is just incredible. Every one of these habits is making your family stronger. Be proud.

SourceText: What went well here in making a rule together?
text: Kwa kuweka sheria pamoja, jambo gani lilienda vizuri hapa?

SourceText: How do you think @global.w_rules_teen_boy knew his @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 appreciated him?
text: Je, unafikiri @global.w_rules_teen_boy alijuaje kuwa @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 wake anamthamini?

SourceText: Making the rule together went well because...
text: Kutengeneza sheria pamoja kulienda vizuri kwa sababu...

SourceText:
* They discussed the reasons behind the rule 
* @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 listened to @global.w_rules_teen_boy’s suggestions 
* The rule was clear, specific and fair 
* @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 praised @global.w_rules_teen_boy for helping to make the rule
text:
* Walijadili sababu za kuwekwa kwa sheria hiyo
* @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 alisikiliza maoni ya @global.w_rules_teen_boy
* Sheria hiyo ilikuwa wazi, maalum na ya haki
* @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 alimsifia @global.w_rules_teen_boy kwa kusaidia kuweka sheria hiyo

SourceText: @global.w_rules_teen_boy knew his @global.w_rules_female_caregiver_1 appreciated him because...

* She praised him
* She rewarded him when he followed the rule
text:
* Alimsifia
* Alimzawadia alipofuata sheria

SourceText: Let's practice making rules.
text: Hebu tufanye mazoezi ya kutengeneza sheria.

SourceText:
* What is one important rule you’d each like to make with your teenager? 
* What do you think your teen will think about that rule? 

Remember, make rules specific and realistic!
text:
* Je, ni sheria gani moja muhimu ambayo kila mmoja wenu angependa kuiweka na kijana wake?
* Je, unadhani kijana wako atafikiriaje kuhusu sheria hiyo?

Kumbuka, sheria ziwe bayana na zinazotekelezeka!

SourceText: Here are some of the rules other families created:
text: Hapa kuna baadhi ya sheria zilizowekwa na familia nyingine:

SourceText:
* Teen can play outside after finishing homework
* All family members are eating dinner together
* Teen 1 does dishes on Sunday and Monday, Teen 2 on Tuesday and Wednesday
* We speak to each other politely and nicely
* When listening to music you need to use earphones
text:
* Kijana anaweza kucheza nje baada ya kumaliza kazi ya nyumbani
* Wanafamilia wote watakula mlo wa usiku pamoja
* Kijana "A" ataosha vyombo siku ya Jumapili na Jumatatu, Kijana "B" siku ya Jumanne na Jumatano
* Tutazungumza baina yetu kwa adabu na kwa wema
* Unaposikiliza muziki, unatakiwa kutumia vifaa vya kusikilizia

SourceText:
Make two maps with your teen of safe and unsafe places:
* Map of your community
* Map of apps and websites your teen uses 

Make sure you are both happy with the safety plan.

What really matters is that you talk with your teen as you do this – often teens know much more than we do about where it is safe and unsafe!
text:
Wewe na kijana wako choreni ramani mbili za maeneo salama na yasiyo salama: 
* Ramani ya jamii yenu
* Ramani ya programu na tovuti ambazo kijana wako anatumia

Hakikisheni wote wawili mnafurahishwa na mpango wa usalama.

Kilicho muhimu hasa ni kwamba utakuwa unazungumza na kijana wako pindi mnapofanya hivyo – mara nyingi vijana wanajua mengi kutuzidi kuhusu maeneo salama na yasiyo salama!

SourceText:
If you have not done it together yet, make two maps with your teen of safe and unsafe places:
* Map of your community
* Map of apps and websites your teen uses 

Make sure you are both happy with the safety plan.

What really matters is that you talk with your teen as you do this – often teens know much more than we do about where it is safe and unsafe!
text:
Kama bado hamjafanya hivyo pamoja, choreni ramani mbili za maeneo salama na yasiyo salama wewe na kijana wako:
* Ramani ya jamii yenu
* Ramani ya programu na tovuti ambazo kijana wako anatumia

Hakikisheni wote mnafurahishwa na mpango wa usalama.

Kilicho muhimu hasa ni kwamba utakuwa unazungumza na kijana wako pindi mnapofanya hivyo – mara nyingi vijana wanajua mengi kutuzidi kuhusu maeneo salama na yasiyo salama!

SourceText: Safety Plan Activity
text: Shughuli ya Mpango wa Usalama

SourceText:
Discuss together:
* Which areas on your map are safe for teenagers 
     – CIRCLE these 
* Which areas on your map are unsafe for teenagers 
     – CROSS those off  
* What makes a place safe or unsafe?  
* What could you and your teen do to keep your teen safer?
text:
Jadilini pamoja:
* Je, maeneo yapi kwenye ramani yako ni salama kwa vijana? 
     – ZUNGUSHIA maeneo hayo 
* Je, maeneo yapi kwenye ramani yako si salama kwa vijana? 
     – KATA KWA MISTARI maeneo hayo  
* Je, ni nini hufanya mahali pawe salama au pasiwe salama?  
* Je, wewe na kijana wako mnaweza kufanya nini ili kumfanya kijana wako awe salama zaidi?

Sometimes, we can find ourselves in trouble. Discuss together:
* Where can you and your teen get support when you face a crisis? 
     – MARK those areas with a little object like a stone or piece of paper.  

Below are some places that can be helpful
text:
Wakati mwingine, tunaweza kujikuta matatani. Jadilini pamoja:
* Je, wewe na kijana wako mnaweza kupata wapi msaada mnapokabiliwa na hali ya hatari? 
     – WEKA ALAMA kwenye maeneo hayo kwa kutumia kitu kidogo kama jiwe au kipande cha karatasi.  

Hapa chini kuna maeneo yanayoweza kukusaidia

SourceText:
* Draw pictures of the apps and websites your teenagers use 
* Praise your teens for how good they are at using the web!  
* Talk about which ones might be unsafe. Why? 
* What could you and your teen do to make using the internet safer for your teen and their friends?
text:

* Sifianeni kwa jinsi wanavyojua kutumia mtandao.
* Zungumzieni zile ambazo zinaweza zisiwe salama. Kwa nini?
* Je, nyinyi na vijana wenu mnaweza kufanya nini ili matumizi ya intaneti yawe salama kwa vijana wenu na marafiki zao?

SourceText: To keep our teens safe, we need to understand the dangerous situations they could get into!
text: Ili kuwaweka salama vijana wetu, tunahitaji kuelewa hali za hatari ambamo wanaweza kujiingiza!

SourceText: Every time you plan or keep a safety plan, click the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!
text: Kila wakati unapopanga mpango wa usalama au unapouzingatia, bofya @global.parent_point ili usherehekee mafanikio yako!

SourceText:
Let’s make two maps together of safe and unsafe places: 
* A map of our community 
* A map of apps/websites we use online 

You will do the same with your teen as home practice this week - if your teen is here now, you can do it together now!
text:
Hebu tuchore pamoja ramani mbili za maeneo salama na yasiyo salama: 
* Ramani ya jamii yetu
* Ramani ya programu/tovuti tunazotumia mtandaoni

Utafanya hivyohivyo na kijana wako kama zoezi la nyumbani la wiki hii – kama kijana wako yuko hapa sasa, mnaweza kufanya pamoja sasa!

SourceText: Safety Plan
text: Mpango wa Usalama

SourceText:
To keep our teens safe, we need to understand the dangerous situations they could get into!

Let’s make two maps together of safe and unsafe places:
* A map of our community
* A map of apps/websites we use online

Let’s make these maps as a group now. 

You’ll do the same with your teen as home practice this week.
text:
Ili kuwaweka salama vijana wetu, tunahitaji kuelewa hali za hatari ambazo wanaweza kuzijingiza!

Hebu tuchore pamoja ramani mbili za maeneo salama na yasiyo salama: 
* Ramani ya jamii yetu
* Ramani ya programu/tovuti tunazotumia mtandaoni

Hebu sasa tuchore ramani hizo kama kikundi.

Utafanya hivyohivyo na kijana wako kama zoezi la nyumbani la wiki hii.

SourceText: Step 1: What are important places in your community?
text: Hatua ya Kwanza: Je, yapi ni maeneo muhimu katika jamii yako?

SourceText:
* Get a piece of paper (or old newspaper or a cardboard box) and a pen. 
* Draw a map of your teen’s community, with pictures of all the main places like streets, your house, school, shops, places your teen visits.
text:
* Chukua kipande cha karatasi (au gazeti la zamani au kasha la karatasi nene) na kalamu.
* Chora ramani ya jamii ya kijana wako, ikiwa na picha za maeneo yote muhimu kama barabara, nyumba yako, shule, maduka, maeneo anayotembelea kijana wako.

SourceText: Step 2: Which places are safe and unsafe?
text: Hatua ya Pili: Je, maeneo yapi ni salama na yapi si salama?

SourceText:
Discuss together:

* Which areas on your map are safe for teenagers 
     – CIRCLE these 
* Which areas on your map are unsafe for teenagers 
     – CROSS those off  
* What makes a place safe or unsafe?  
* What could you and your teen do to keep your teen safer?
text:
Jadilini pamoja:

* Je, maeneo yapi kwenye ramani yako ni salama kwa vijana? 
     – ZUNGUSHIA maeneo hayo 
* Je, maeneo yapi kwenye ramani yako si salama kwa vijana? 
     – KATA KWA MISTARI maeneo hayo  
* Je, ni nini hufanya mahali pawe salama au pasiwe salama?  
* Je, wewe na kijana wako mnaweza kufanya nini ili kumfanya kijana wako awe salama zaidi?

SourceText: Step 3: Where can you get support?
text: Hatua ya Tatu: Je, unaweza kupata wapi msaada?

SourceText:
Sometimes, we can find ourselves in trouble. Discuss together:
 
* Where can you and your teen get support when you face a crisis? 
     – MARK those areas with a little object like a stone or piece of paper.
text:
Wakati mwingine, tunaweza kujikuta matatani. Jadilini pamoja:
 
* Je, wewe na kijana wako mnaweza kupata wapi msaada mnapokabiliwa na hali ya hatari? 
     – WEKA ALAMA kwenye maeneo hayo kwa kutumia kitu kidogo kama jiwe au kipande cha karatasi.

SourceText: Resources to help in the community
text: Rasilimali za msaada katika jamii

SourceText: Step 4: What are risky places online and how can you make them safer?
text: Hatua ya Nne: Je, maeneo gani mtandaoni ni ya hatari na unawezaje kuyafanya yawe salama zaidi?

SourceText:
* Draw pictures of the apps and websites your teenagers use 
* Praise each other for how good they are at using the web!  
* Talk about which ones might be unsafe. Why? 
* What could you and your teen do to make using the internet safer for your teen and their friends?
text:
* Choreni picha za programu na tovuti ambazo vijana wenu hutumia
* Sifianeni kwa jinsi wanavyojua kutumia mtandao.
* Zungumzieni zile ambazo zinaweza zisiwe salama. Kwa nini?
* Je, nyinyi na vijana wenu mnaweza kufanya nini ili matumizi ya intaneti yawe salama kwa vijana wenu na marafiki zao?

SourceText: Online Safety Resources
text: Rasilimali za Usalama Mtandaoni

SourceText: Have you talked with your teen about safety measures?
text: Je, umezungumza na kijana wako kuhusu hatua za usalama?

SourceText:
This has been the hardest of times to be a parent. You should be so proud of yourself for everything you have done. 

Think about every time you have made your teen smile and all the care you have given them. Parents are incredible, and you are incredible!
text:
Huu ni wakati mgumu zaidi wa kuwa mzazi. Unapaswa kujionea fahari kwa kila kitu ulichofanya.

Kumbuka kila wakati ulipomfanya kijana wako atabasamu na matunzo yote uliyompa. Wazazi ni wazuri sana, na wewe pia ni mzuri!

SourceText:
To keep your teen safe, it helps to chat together about your community and their online experiences. 

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title and see how you can do this!
text:
Ili kijana wako awe salama, ni vizuri mpige soga pamoja kuhusu jamii yenu na shughuli zake mtandaoni.

Maliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title halafu utaona jinsi unavyoweza kufanya jambo hili!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText:
Hi @fields.user_name! You are nearly at the end of your @global.parent_app workshops! Thank you for your long-lasting commitment. 

This week’s workshop is about keeping our teens safe, both online and in the community. Enjoy!
text:
Habari @fields.user_name! Unakaribia kumaliza warsha zako za @global.parent_app! Asante kwa kujitolea kwako kwa dhati kwa muda mrefu.

Warsha ya wiki hii inahusu kuwaweka salama vijana wetu, mtandaoni na katika jamii. Furahia!

Umepata ujuzi mwingi wa malezi kwa wiki kadhaa zilizopita!

Maliza warsha inayofuata ili kupata ujuzi mwingine wa kukusaidia.

SourceText:
It seems you haven’t finished the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title yet. Making a plan together with your teen can prevent many problems – give it a try before moving on!

Well done for using @global.parent_app to support your family.
text:
Inaonekana bado haujamaliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kuweka mpango pamoja na kijana wako kunaweza kuzuia matatizo mengi – jaribu kufanya hivyo kabla ya kuendelea!

Hongera kwa kutumia @global.parent_app ili kuisaidia familia yako.

SourceText: Congratulations, you completed @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, a new workshop is ready for you to help you and your family deal with any situation – together you can do so much!
text: Hongera, umemaliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kesho, warsha mpya itakuwa tayari kwa ajili yako ili kukusaidia wewe na familia yako kukabiliana na hali yoyote – pamoja mnaweza kufanya makubwa!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: The man in the car was pressuring @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 with gifts
text: Mwanaume ndani ya gari alikuwa akimshinikiza @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 kwa zawadi
note: The string @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1's friend was encouraging her
text: Rafiki yake @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 alikuwa akimtia moyo
note: The string @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: Going with an older man puts @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 in a dangerous situation where she can get hurt or be forced to do things
text: Kwenda na mwanaume mwenye umri mkubwa kunamweka @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 kwenye hali ya hatari kwani anaweza kuumizwa au kulazimishwa kufanya mambo fulani
note: The string @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: Many girls in our communities get pregnant or catch HIV from older men
text: Wasichana wengi katika jamii zetu wanapata mimba au kuambukizwa VVU na wanaume wenye umri mkubwa

SourceText: There were no other trusted adults to advise @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1
text: Hakukuwa na watu wazima wengine wanaoaminika wa kumshauri @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1
note: The string @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: Let's think about what happened to @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1:
text: Hebu tufikirie kuhusu kile kilichotokea kwa @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1:
note: The string @global.w_safe_teen_girl_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: What was risky about that situation?
text: Kitu gani kilikuwa cha hatari kwenye tukio hilo?

SourceText: All those things are true!
text: Mambo yote hayo ni ya kweli!

SourceText: Adults use social media, gaming and messaging apps and websites to meet teenagers and persuade them to do sexual things
text: Watu wazima hutumia mitandao ya kijamii, programu za michezo, programu za kutuma ujumbe na tovuti mbalimbali ili kukutana na vijana na kuwashawishi wafanye mambo ya ngono

SourceText: People put things online to make us hurt other people – like making violence seem cool, or hating people from another race or country
text: Watu huweka vitu mtandaoni ili kutufanya tuwaumize watu wengine – kama kufanya vurugu zionekane jambo zuri, au kuchukia watu wa asili nyingine au nchi nyingine

SourceText: People put things online to persuade teenagers to hurt themselves or commit suicide
text: Watu huweka vitu mtandaoni ili kuwashawishi vijana kujiumiza au kujiua

SourceText: Teenagers share sexy videos or photos or information about themselves, and people show it to others or use it to upset them
text: Vijana huwashirikisha watu wengine video au picha zinazovutia kimapenzi au taarifa zinazowahusu, na watu huzionyesha kwa wengine au huzitumia kuwafadhaisha

SourceText: People can often be nasty to teenagers online – they feel like they can bully people safely
text: Mara nyingi watu wanaweza kuwafanyia ubaya vijana mtandaoni – wanahisi kama wanaweza kuwaonea watu halafu wao wakabaki salama

SourceText: Let's think about our teens' online safety.
text: Hebu tufikirie usalama wa vijana wetu mtandaoni.

SourceText: What is the biggest online risk for teens these days?
text: Je, ipi ni hatari iliyo kubwa zaidi kwa vijana mtandaoni siku hizi?

SourceText: Doing any of these makes you a great parent.
text: Kufanya jambo lolote kati ya haya hukufanya uwe mzazi mzuri sana.

SourceText: Let's talk about our teens' online safety.
text: Hebu tuzungumzie usalama wa vijana wetu mtandaoni.

SourceText: What are some of the online risks for teens these days?
text: Je, ni zipi hatari za mtandaoni kwa vijana siku hizi?

SourceText:
* Adults use social media, gaming and messaging apps and websites to meet teenagers and persuade them to do sexual things 
* People put things online to make us hurt other people – like making violence seem cool, or hating people from another race or country
* People put things online to persuade teenagers to hurt themselves or commit suicide
* Teenagers share sexy videos or photos or information about themselves, and people show it to others or use it to upset them
* People can often be nasty to teenagers online – they feel like they can bully people safely
text:
* Watu wazima hutumia mitandao ya kijamii, programu za michezo, programu za kutuma ujumbe na tovuti mbalimbali ili kukutana na vijana na kuwashawishi wafanye mambo ya ngono
* Watu huweka vitu mtandaoni ili kutufanya tuwaumize watu wengine – kama kufanya vurugu zionekane jambo zuri, au kuchukia watu wa asili nyingine au nchi nyingine
* Watu huweka vitu mtandaoni ili kuwashawishi vijana kujiumiza au kujiua
* Vijana huwashirikisha watu wengine video au picha zinazovutia kimapenzi au taarifa zinazowahusu, na watu huzionyesha kwa wengine au huzitumia kuwafadhaisha
* Mara nyingi watu wanaweza kuwafanyia ubaya vijana mtandaoni – wanahisi kama wanaweza kuwaonea watu halafu wao wakabaki salama

SourceText:
Teach your teenagers the four steps of problem-solving:
KNOW IT - SOLVE IT - TRY IT - TEST IT 

Use these steps together when a problem comes up!

When something bad happens, we often get upset and blame. But what our teens really need is someone to help find solutions together. Listen to them, accept how they see and feel things, and thank them for trusting you.

Teaching your teen how to deal with problems will help them for the rest of their lives. What a gift!
text:
Wafundishe vijana wako hatua nne za kutatua matatizo:
ELEWA – TATUA – CHAGUA – JARIBU

Tumieni hatua hizi tatizo linapojitokeza.

Jambo baya linapotokea, mara nyingi tunafadhaika na kulaumu. Lakini kile ambacho vijana wetu wanahitaji ni mtu wa kuwasaidia kulitatua tatizo. Wasikilize, kubali jinsi wanavyoyaona mambo na kuyahisi, na washukuru kwa kukuamini.

Kumfundisha kijana wako jinsi ya kutatua matatizo kutamsaidia maishani mwake mwote. Zawadi iliyoje!

SourceText: Some problems other parents solved with their teens:
text: Baadhi ya matatizo ambayo wazazi waliyatatua na vijana wao:

SourceText:
* My teenager does not want to go to school
* I am worried my teenager will get pregnant or will get someone pregnant
* I am worried about what my teen does online
* My teenager is hanging out with bad friends
* My teenager is lazy
* My teenager is not doing their school work
* My teenager might be using drugs
text:
* Kijana wangu hataki kwenda shule
* Nina wasiwasi kijana wangu atapata ujauzito au atampa mtu mjamzito
* Nina wasiwasi kuhusu anachofanya kijana wangu mtandaoni
* Kijana wangu ana marafiki wabaya
* Kijana wangu ni mvivu
* Kijana wangu hafanyi kazi zake za shuleni
* Huenda kijana wangu anatumia madawa ya kulevya

SourceText:
Parenting teens is really hard. 

Often there are no simple and easy solutions, but now @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 learned she can talk to her daughter about these things. 

Before, she worried alone, now they can come up with solutions together!

Mara nyingi huwa hakuna njia za utatuzi zilizo rahisi na zilizonyooka, lakini sasa @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1 amejifunza kwamba kumbe anaweza kuzungumza mambo haya na binti yake.

Kabla, alikuwa akipata wasiwasi peke yake, lakini sasa wanaweza kutafuta pamoja njia za utatuzi!

SourceText: That didn’t work... Let's try something else.

SourceText: Return the phone and save up
text: Rudisha simu na uanze kujiwekea akiba

SourceText: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: "I am not trying to accuse your friend or be jealous. I am worried that when someone gives a gift it is hard to say 'no' when they ask something in return – like sex. If you want to have a phone, we will save up together so you can make your own decisions without owing him anything."
text: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: "Simlaumu rafiki yako wala sioni wivu. Nina wasiwasi kwamba mtu anapokupatia zawadi, ni vigumu kumkatalia atakapokuomba umlipe fadhila – kama vile ngono. Kama unataka kuwa na simu, tutajiwekea akiba pamoja ili uweze kufanya maamuzi yako mwenyewe bila yeye kukudai chochote."

text: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_1: "Hii inanifanya nitambue kuwa tunapaswa kuzungumza kuhusu marafiki wa kiume na jinsi unavyoweza kujikinga. Vijana wengi wa rika lako wanapata mimba au VVU. Hebu twende kliniki uzungumze na muuguzi ili ujifunze jinsi unavyoweza kujikinga.”

SourceText: Your home practice is to read and discuss this module's stories together with your teen, and let it spark a conversation about body changes and intimate relationships.

SourceText: There are two home practices for this week.

SourceText:
Whenever you are feeling stressed or upset: take five breaths in and out before you react. 

And when you're both calm, share with your teen how you feel.
text:
Wakati wowote unapohisi msongo wa mawazo au kufadhaika: vuta pumzi na kuzishusha mara tano kabla ya kufanya chochote.

Nyote wawili mtakapokuwa mmetulia, mshirikishe kijana wako jinsi unavyojisikia.

SourceText: Choose a "@global.safety_word" with your teenager, and think of a situation together when you could use this.
text: Chagua "@global.safety_word", na kijana wako na mfikiri kwa pamoja mazingira ambayo mnaweza kutumia.

SourceText: How have your stress levels been this week? Try to take a few deep breaths before responding to your teen - it makes a big difference.

SourceText: Well done!

SourceText: Well done for taking a big breath before responding to your teen! Each time you are taking a pause, you are getting back control.

SourceText: Happy, sad, angry, excited, worried? Well done for recognizing how you and others felt today! And remember, tomorrow is a brand new day.
text: Je, una furaha, huzuni, hasira, taharuki au wasiwasi? Vizuri sana kwa kutambua jinsi wewe na wengine mlivyojisikia leo! Na kumbuka, kesho ni siku mpya.

SourceText:
We all feel overwhelmed sometimes. Taking a deep breath helps! 

Complete the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title to get some useful tools to deal with stress.

SourceText:
Hi @fields.group_name! Congratulations for starting @global.parent_app week 5.

A new parenting @global.workshop awaits you with tips how we can stay calm and in control when our teens are driving us crazy.
text:
Habari @fields.group_name! Hongera kwa kuanza wiki ya 5 ya @global.parent_app.

@global.workshop mpya ya malezi inakusubiri ikiwa na dondoo za jinsi tunavyoweza kuwa watulivu na kudhibiti mambo pindi vijana wetu wanapotuchanganya.

SourceText: We have a new @global.workshop available for you about managing anger and stress. It will help you take better care of yourself.
text: Tuna @global.workshop kipya kwa ajili yako kinachohusu kudhibiti hasira na msongo wa mawazo. Itakusaidia kujithamini zaidi.
note: The string @global.workshop should not be translated.

SourceText:
Tomorrow a brand new @global.parent_app @global.workshop is ready for you. 

By completing the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title first, you lay a really important foundation: If you feel good, your family will do better too!
text:
Kesho @global.workshop kipya kabisa ya @global.parent_app kitakuwa tayari kwa ajili yako.

Kwa kumalizia kwanza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title, utajiwekea msingi mzuri sana: Wewe utakapojisikia vizuri, familia yako nayo itajisikia vizuri!

SourceText: Well done for completing the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Tomorrow, you can access a new workshop to help you relax and build valuable skills!
text: Hongera kwa kumaliza @local.workshop_data.in_text_title. Kesho, utaweza kupata kipindi kipya na kitakusaidia kupumzika na kujifunza ujuzi muhimu sana!
note: The string @local.workshop_data.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Recognise why he feels stressed
text: Kutambua kwa nini anahisi msongo wa mawazo

SourceText: Take a deep breath and speak calmly
text: Kuvuta pumzi ndefu na kuzungumza kwa utulivu

SourceText: Show he understands his teen’s feelings
text: Kuonesha kuwa anaelewa hisia za kijana wake

SourceText: Think about solutions together with @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1
text: Kufikiria utatuzi pamoja na @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1
note: The string @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: Do something positive together with @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1
text: Kufanya kitu chanya pamoja na @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1
note: The string @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: Sad
text: Huzuni

SourceText: Scared
text: Kuogopa

SourceText: Confused
text: Kuchanganyikiwa

SourceText: Angry
text: Hasira

SourceText: Let's think about what happened in this story.
text: Hebu tufikirie kuhusu kilichotokea kwenye Hadithi hii.

SourceText: How do you think @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 felt?
text: Je, unadhani @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 alijisikiaje?
note: The string @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 should not be translated.

SourceText: And @global.w_stress_male_caregiver?
text: Na @global.w_stress_male_caregiver, je?
note: The string @global.w_stress_male_caregiver should not be translated.

SourceText: And @global.w_stress_girl?
text: Na @global.w_stress_girl, je?
note: The string @global.w_stress_girl should not be translated.

SourceText: Each of them was feeling upset for their own reason!
text: Kila mmoja wao alihisi kufadhaika kwa sababu zake mwenyewe!

SourceText: What could @global.w_stress_male_caregiver have done differently?
text: Je, @global.w_stress_male_caregiver angeweza kufanyaje tofauti?
note: The string @global.w_stress_male_caregiver should not be translated.

SourceText: Having a @global.safety_word can help your teen stay safe too.
text: Kuwa na @global.safety_word inaweza kumsaidia kijana wako kuwa salama pia.
note: The string @global.safety_word should not be translated.

SourceText:
You can choose any word as a @global.safety_word. Only your family knows it means ‘help’. 

Your teen can say this word to let you know they are in trouble without you getting angry or punishing them, so you can help them.
text:
Unaweza kuchagua neno lolote kama @global.safety_word. Ni familia yako tu inajua linamaanisha 'msaada'.

Kijana wako anaweza kusema neno hili kufahamisha wanapokuwa katika matatizo pasipo wewe kuwa na hasira au kuwaadhibu, ili uweze kuwasaidia.
note: The string @global.safety_word should not be translated.

SourceText: What @global.safety_word can you choose with your teen?
text: Ni @global.safety_word ipi unaweza kuchagua na kijana wako?
note: The string @global.safety_word should not be translated.

SourceText:
Your teen can say:
"I saw..."
"I look forward to..."
"Did you remember to…?"

You respond calmly and give your teen an excuse why they need to come home.
text:
Kijana wako anaweza kusema:
"Nimeona..."
"Ninatazamia..."
"Ulikumbuka ku...?"

Unajibu kwa utulivu na kuwaambia vijana wako kwa nini wanatakiwa kuja nyumbani.

SourceText: A specific food
text: Chakula maalumu

SourceText: A specific family member
text: Mwanafamilia maalumu

SourceText: A specific animal
text: Mnyama maalumu

SourceText: Something else
text: Kitu kingine

SourceText: This is fantastic, especially in such difficult times as this. You are a star.
text: Hiyo ni nzuri, hasa kwenye nyakati ngumu kama hizi. Wewe ni mshindi.

SourceText: Today you will explore:
text: Leo mtachunguza:

SourceText:
* Story & discussion – that didn’t work…
* Story & discussion – that worked!
* Safety Amnesty story & discussion – that worked!
* Tools: How to manage stress
BREATHE - SHARE - SHOW
* Home practice suggestions
text:
* Hadithi & majadiliano – ambayo hayakufanikiwa…
* Hadithi & majadiliano – ambayo yalifanikiwa!
* Hadithi ya Msamaha wa Usalama & majadiliano – ambayo yalifanikiwa!
* Nyenzo: Jinsi ya kudhibiti msongo wa mawazo
VUTA PUMZI – SHIRIKISHA WENGINE – ONYESHA
* Mazoezi ya nyumbani yanayopendekezwa

SourceText:
* Story & reflection – that didn’t work…
* Story & reflection – that worked!
* Safety Amnesty story & reflection – that worked!
* Tools: How to manage stress
BREATHE - SHARE - SHOW
* Home practice suggestions
text:
* Hadithi & tafakari – ambayo haikufanikiwa…
* Hadithi & tafakari – ambayo ilifanikiwa!
* Hadithi ya Msamaha wa Usalama & majadiliano – ambayo yalifanikiwa!
* Nyenzo: Jinsi ya kudhibiti msongo wa mawazo
VUTA PUMZI – SHIRIKISHA WENGINE – ONESHA
* Mazoezi ya nyumbani yanayopendekezwa

SourceText: Let's discuss what happened in this story.
text: Hebu tujadili kilichotokea kwenye hadithi hii.

SourceText:
How do you think @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 felt? And his @global.w_stress_male_caregiver? And @global.w_stress_girl?

What could @global.w_stress_male_caregiver have done differently?
text:
Je, unadhani @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1 alijisikiaje? Na @global.w_stress_male_caregiver wake, je? Na @global.w_stress_girl, je?

Je, @global.w_stress_male_caregiver angeweza kufanyaje badala yake?

SourceText: @global.w_stress_male_caregiver could...
text: @global.w_stress_male_caregiver angeweza...
note: The string @global.w_stress_male_caregiver should not be translated.

SourceText:
* Recognise why he feels stressed 
* Take a deep breath and speak calmly  
* Show he understands his teen’s feelings 
* Think about solutions together with @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1
* Do something positive together with @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1
text:
* Kutambua kwa nini anahisi msongo wa mawazo
* Kuvuta pumzi ndefu na kuzungumza kwa utulivu
* Kuonyesha kuwa anaelewa hisia za kijana wake
* Kufikiria utatuzi pamoja na @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1
* Kufanya kitu chanya pamoja na @global.w_stress_teen_boy_1

SourceText:
Discuss the @data.workshop.w_svp.in_text_title with your teens. 

You can even do the activities on warning signs and how to use our voice and body together. 

It can be hard to talk about these topics together, but it will give your teen skills for situations when they need it most. You can do it!
text:
Jadili mada ya @data.workshop.w_svp.in_text_title na vijana wako.

Unaweza hata kufanya shughuli za ishara na onyo jinsi ya kutumia sauti na miili yetu pamoja.

Inaweza kuwa vigumu kuzungumza juu ya mada hizi pamoja, lakini itawapa vijana wako ujuzi wa kutumia wakiwa na uhitaji zaidi. Unaweza kufanya hivyo!
note: The string @data.workshop.w_svp.in_text_title should not be translated.

SourceText: Let’s think back of @global.w_svp_teen_girl_2’s dangerous situation:
text: Hebu tufikirie mwanzo hali ya hatari ya @global.w_svp_teen_girl_2:
note: The string @global.w_svp_teen_girl_2 should not be translated.

SourceText: Could this situation happen to a boy?
text: Je, hali hii inaweza kutokea kwa mvulana?

SourceText: Could a boy use his voice to get away?
text: Je, mvulana anaweza kutumia sauti yake kutoroka?

SourceText: Yes
text: Ndiyo

SourceText: No
text: Hapana

SourceText: Boys and girls can both find themselves in dangerous situations. Both boys and girls are allowed to do, say, and believe anything that will help them stay safe.
text: Wavulana na wasichana wote wanaweza kujikuta katika hali hatari. Wavulana na wasichana wanaruhusiwa kufanya, kusema, na kuamini chochote kitakachowasaidia kukaa salama.

SourceText: This big button takes you to the @global.workshop you are currently exploring. Tap this to find:
text: Hiki kitufe kikubwa kitakupeleka kwenye @global.workshop unayopitia kwa sasa. Gusa hiki kukipata.
note: The string @global.workshop should not be translated.

SourceText: Have a look around! Wherever you start, just the fact you are here shows you care.
text: Angalia! Popote utakapoanzia, ukweli ni kwamba kuwepo hapa inaonesha unajali.

SourceText: This big button takes you to the @global.workshop you are currently exploring. Tap it to find:
text: Hiki kitufe kikubwa kitakupeleka kwenye @global.workshop unayopitia kwa sasa. Gusa hiki kukipata:
note: The string @global.workshop should not be translated.

SourceText: A set of activities to help you build a parenting skill.
text: Kazi za kukusaidia kujenga mbinu za malezi.

SourceText: Quick reminders on how to successfully use a parenting skill.
text: Ukumbusho wa haraka jinsi unavyoweza kutumia ujuzi wa malezi kwa mafanikio.

SourceText: One easy idea on how you can apply a new skill with your family.
text: Ukumbusho wa haraka jinsi unavyoweza kutumia ujuzi wa malezi kwa mafanikio.

SourceText: Here you can select any of the other @global.workshops in @global.parent_app. Each @global.workshop gives you one important parenting skill. Swipe to see the next @global.workshops.
text: Hapa unaweza kuchagua @global.workshops nyingine yoyote katika @global.parent_app. Kila @global.workshops inakupa ujuzi muhimu wa malezi.

SourceText: You can explore any @global.workshop whenever you want. To see the biggest change in your family, complete all the activities in one @global.workshop before moving to the next one.
text: Unaweza kuchunguza @global.workshop yoyote wakati wowote unaotaka. Kuona mabadiliko makubwa katika familia yako, maliza shughuli zako zote katika moja ya @global.workshop kabla ya kuhamia kingine.

SourceText: Things to do
text: Vitu vya kufanya

SourceText: Tap here whenever you enter @global.parent_app! You will find 3 short activities that you can do next to help yourself and your family.
text: Bonyeza hapa kila unapoingia kwenye @global.parent_app! Utapata shughuli tatu fupi unzaoweza kufanya zikusaidie wewe na familia yako.
note: The string @global.parent_app! should not be translated.

SourceText: The HOUSE button brings you back to the home screen at any time.
text: Kitufe cha NYUMBA kinakurudisha kwenye skrini ya kwanza wakati wowote.

SourceText: The STAR button takes you to the @global.parent_points. Each new parenting skill comes with a @global.parent_point. @global.parent_points help you celebrate your achievements.
text: Kitufe cha NYOTA kinakupeleka wewe kwenye @global.parent_points. Kila ujuzi mpya wa malezi huja na @global.parent_point. @global.parent_points zinakusaidia wewe kusherehekea mafanikio.

SourceText: Tap the BOOK button to go to the @global.parent_centre. Check out the extra relaxation activities and ideas for fun things to do with your teen! You can also find contact details for support services in your area and for technical support with @global.parent_app.
text: Gusa kitufe cha KITABU ili kwenda kwenye @global.parent_centre. Angalia kazi za zaidi za kupumzika na mawazo ya kufurahisha kufanya na kijana wako! Unaweza pia kupata taarifa za mawasiliano za msaada katika eneo lako na msaada wa kiufundi kwenye @global.parent_app.

SourceText: Welcome to @global.parent_app
text: Karibu kwenye @global.parent_app
note: The string @global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText:
You deserve to feel good, and have happier family relationships.

@global.parent_app is here to support you.

Here is how to use the app:
text:
Unastahili kujisikia vizuri, na kuwa na mahusiano ya furaha zaidi ya kifamilia.

@global.parent_app iko hapa kukusaidia.

Hapa ni jnsi unavyoweza kutumia programu:
note:
The string

@global.parent_app should not be translated.

SourceText: This big button takes you to your @global.weekly_workshops.
text: Hiki kitufe kikubwa kinakupeleka katika @global.weekly_workshops.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops. should not be translated.

SourceText: Each week you will unlock a new @global.workshop focusing on a different parenting skill.
text: Kila wiki utafungua @global.workshop mpya ikijikita katika ujuzi tofauti wa malezi
note: The string @global.workshop should not be translated.

SourceText: The round button appears when a new @global.workshop is ready for you.
text: Kitufe cha duara kitatokea pindi @global.workshop mpya inapokuwa tayari kwa ajili yako.
note: The string @global.workshop should not be translated.

SourceText: Each new parenting skill comes with a @global.parent_point.
text: Kila ujuzi mpya wa malezi huja na @global.parent_point.
note:
The string @global.parent_point.

should not be translated.

SourceText: Use @global.parent_points to celebrate your achievements!
text: Tumia @global.parent_points kusherehekea mafanikio yako!
note: The string @global.parent_points should not be translated.

SourceText:
Find lots of helpful resources in the @global.parent_centre.

You can get instant access to the Essential Tools from all @global.weekly_workshops.
text:
Pata rasilimali nyingi za kukusaidia katika @global.parent_centre.

Unaweza kupata uwezo wa papo kwa hapo kupata Nyenzo Muhimu kutoka katika @global.weekly_workshops.

SourceText:
Check out the extra relaxation and parenting activities!

You can also get quick parenting tips and technical support.
text:
Angalia shughuli za ziada za kupumzika na malezi!

Unaweza pia kupata dondoo za malezi na msaada wa kiufundi kwa haraka.

SourceText: Have a look around! Wherever you start, just the fact you are here shows you care.
text: Tazama! Popote utakapoanzia, hata uwepo wako hapa unaonesha unajali.

SourceText: Go to the @global.weekly_workshops
text: Nenda kwenye @global.weekly_workshops
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Press this button on the home screen to go to the @global.weekly_workshops
text: Bonyeza kitufe hiki kwenye skrini ya mwanzo ili kwenda kwenye @global.weekly_workshops
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Go to the @global.weekly_workshop_options
text: Nenda kwenye @global.weekly_workshop_options
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop_options should not be translated.

SourceText: Press this button to go to the @global.weekly_workshop_options
text: Bonyeza kitufe hiki ili kwenda kwenye @global.weekly_workshop_options
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop_options should not be translated.

SourceText: Use the @global.weekly_workshop_options to change your @global.workshop settings.
text: Tumia @global.weekly_workshop_options kubadilisha mipangilio yako ya @global.workshop.

SourceText: You can change your name here.
text: Unaweza kubadilisha jina lako hapa.

SourceText:
This shows the day of the week that your new @global.weekly_workshop becomes available.

If you want to change it, just press it.
text:
Hii inaonesha siku ya wiki ambayo @global.weekly_workshop mpya itakuwa tayari kwa ajili yako.

Ukitaka kuibadilisha, bonyeza tu kitufe.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop should not be translated.

SourceText: This shows the @global.weekly_workshop that you're currently on.
text: Hii inaonesha @global.weekly_workshop unayojifunza sasa.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshop should not be translated.

SourceText: You can change here whether you want to do your @global.weekly_workshops as a group or by yourself.
text: Kama unataka kufanya @global.weekly_workshops kama kikundi au peke yako, unaweza kubadilisha hapa.
note: The string @global.weekly_workshops should not be translated.

SourceText: Tap here to change your group name.
text: Bonyeza hapa kubadili jina la kikundi chako.
